name: Warlord
description: Commanders who focus on victory through superior tactics and battlefield dominance, valuing efficiency and results above all else while mastering the art of warfare in all its forms.

resource_systems.name: Stamina
resource_systems.description: Physical energy that powers combat abilities and tactical maneuvers
mechanics: Stamina points are spent to perform special combat maneuvers and tactical abilities
Some abilities require maintaining focus, consuming stamina over time
Short rests restore a significant portion of maximum stamina
Depleted stamina causes penalties to attack speed and tactical control
Can be temporarily boosted through battlefield advantage in critical situations
Executing successful tactical maneuvers increases stamina regeneration

resource_systems.name: Combat Readiness
resource_systems.description: State of tactical awareness and preparation that enhances combat effectiveness
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds during combat, decreases during periods of inaction
mechanics: Increases by 20 when landing critical hits or successfully executing tactical maneuvers
Increases by 15 per 10 seconds in active combat
Decreases by 20 when tactical plans fail or when caught off-guard
Decreases by 15 per minute when out of combat
Can be spent to enhance combat abilities or execute special maneuvers
Can be partially transferred to allies to improve their combat performance
Maintaining tactical advantage significantly increases Combat Readiness

resource_systems.name: Command Authority
resource_systems.description: Measure of leadership influence and tactical control over the battlefield
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when successfully leading allies or controlling battlefield conditions
mechanics: Increases by 15 when allies successfully follow your tactical directions
Increases by 10 when maintaining battlefield control and tactical advantage
Decreases by 15 when tactical plans fail or when losing battlefield control
Decreases by 10 when forced to retreat or abandon strategic objectives
Can be spent to issue powerful commands or implement complex battle strategies
Higher Command Authority increases the precision and effectiveness of coordinated attacks

resource_systems.name: Strategic Dominance
resource_systems.description: Measure of your control over battlefield conditions and tactical advantage
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when maintaining tactical advantage or controlling key battlefield positions
mechanics: Increases by 15 when successfully predicting and countering enemy tactics
Increases by 20 when controlling key strategic positions
Decreases by 10 when enemies successfully counter your tactics
Decreases by 15 when losing control of strategic positions
Can be spent to implement advanced battle strategies or create tactical advantages
At maximum Strategic Dominance, gain perfect battlefield awareness and tactical control

class_mechanics.name: Master Strategist
class_mechanics.description: Unparalleled understanding of battlefield tactics and strategic planning
effects: Can analyze battlefield conditions and identify optimal strategies with perfect accuracy
Able to predict enemy movements and prepare effective countermeasures
Can identify and exploit critical weaknesses in enemy formations and defenses
Presence provides tactical insights to allies, improving their positioning and effectiveness
Can develop and implement complex battle plans that adapt to changing conditions

class_mechanics.name: Battlefield Control
class_mechanics.description: Ability to manipulate battlefield conditions and enemy positioning
effects: Can force enemies into disadvantageous positions through superior tactics
Able to create and exploit terrain advantages even in unfavorable conditions
Can control the flow of battle, dictating engagement terms and timing
Presence disrupts enemy formations and communication
Can establish zones of control that restrict enemy movement and actions

class_mechanics.name: Tactical Adaptation
class_mechanics.description: Ability to quickly analyze and counter enemy tactics
effects: Can identify enemy tactics and develop counters with minimal observation
Able to rapidly adjust strategies when battlefield conditions change
Can recognize patterns in enemy behavior and exploit predictable actions
Presence forces enemies to constantly change tactics, reducing their effectiveness
Can turn enemy strengths into weaknesses through clever tactical adjustments

class_mechanics.name: Weapon Mastery
class_mechanics.description: Complete mastery of all conventional weapons and combat techniques
effects: Exceptional proficiency with all weapon types, able to switch between them seamlessly
Can identify and exploit weaknesses in enemy equipment and fighting styles
Able to adapt fighting techniques to counter specific enemy tactics
Presence intimidates enemies, potentially causing hesitation or mistakes
Can analyze and replicate observed combat techniques with minimal practice

signature_abilities.name: Perfect Strategy
signature_abilities.description: Implement a flawless battle plan that anticipates and counters all enemy actions
mechanics: For 3 minutes, gain perfect tactical awareness of the battlefield
All allies receive specific tactical instructions that provide significant combat bonuses
Enemy tactics and movements are predicted with 90% accuracy
Coordinated attacks deal 50% additional damage and have increased critical chance
If enemies attempt to flee or regroup, gain the ability to intercept or disrupt them
Costs 100 Stamina, 50 Command Authority, and 75 Strategic Dominance

signature_abilities.name: Tactical Superiority
signature_abilities.description: Create and exploit a decisive tactical advantage on the battlefield
mechanics: Analyze the battlefield and identify the optimal position for tactical advantage
All allies gain significant movement speed to quickly secure the position
Once the position is secured, create a zone of control that lasts for 5 minutes
Within the zone, allies gain 30% increased damage and 40% damage reduction
Enemies within the zone suffer movement penalties and reduced combat effectiveness
Costs 75 Stamina, 30 Command Authority, and 50 Strategic Dominance

signature_abilities.name: Supreme Commander
signature_abilities.description: Temporarily achieve perfect battlefield control and combat mastery
mechanics: For 2 minutes, enter a state of perfect tactical clarity and combat excellence
All attributes increased by 40%, all damage dealt increased by 80%
Can issue commands that provide powerful, specific bonuses to individual allies
Gain the ability to counter any observed enemy ability or tactic
Each successful attack or tactical maneuver extends the duration by 5 seconds
Costs 50 Stamina, 100 Strategic Dominance, and 25 Command Authority

skill_trees.name: Path of the Strategist
key_abilities: Grand Strategy: Develop a comprehensive battle plan that provides significant bonuses throughout an encounter
Tactical Repositioning: Force enemies into disadvantageous positions while moving allies to optimal ones
Strategic Reserve: Store combat resources for critical moments, gaining significant bonuses when used

skill_trees.name: Path of the Conqueror
key_abilities: Intimidating Presence: Strike fear into enemies, reducing their combat effectiveness
Exploit Weakness: Identify and target critical vulnerabilities in enemy defenses
Battlefield Dominance: Establish complete control over a section of the battlefield

skill_trees.name: Path of the Weapon Master
skill_trees.focus: Mastery of all weapons and combat techniques
key_abilities: Weapon Versatility: Gain significant bonuses when switching between different weapon types
Combat Analysis: Study enemy fighting styles to gain increasing advantages against them
Perfect Counter: Automatically counter enemy combat techniques after observing them

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 15 points in the Master Tactician skill tree
advancement_requirements.alignment: Must maintain Neutral alignment for at least 10 levels
challenges: Successfully implement a complex battle strategy
Defeat a numerically superior force through tactics

legendary_items.name: Tactician's Helm
effects: Intelligence increased by 5
Gain perfect battlefield awareness, seeing all enemies even through obstacles
Can analyze enemy weaknesses and relay tactical information to all allies

legendary_items.name: Conqueror's Edge
effects: Adapts its form to the optimal weapon type for current combat situation
Each consecutive hit on the same target increases damage by 10% (stacks up to 100%)
Critical hits force enemies into disadvantageous positions

legendary_items.name: Commander's Regalia
effects: Strategic Dominance maximum increased by 50
Commands issued have 50% increased effectiveness and range
When Strategic Dominance is at maximum, gain immunity to tactical disadvantages

lore: Warlords represent the pinnacle of tactical excellence among Commanders, having dedicated themselves to the mastery of warfare in all its forms. These battlefield geniuses have transcended ordinary military leadership to become living embodiments of strategic perfection, capable of analyzing complex battlefield conditions in moments and implementing flawless battle plans that consistently lead to victory. The path to becoming a Warlord requires not only exceptional combat skills and leadership abilities but also a brilliant tactical mind and unwavering focus on efficiency and results. Those who succeed find themselves capable of controlling the flow of battle with unprecedented precision, turning even the most chaotic conflicts into carefully orchestrated demonstrations of military superiority. Warlords typically maintain a pragmatic approach to warfare, valuing victory and the preservation of their forces above ideological concerns. Many serve as high-ranking military commanders, using their exceptional tactical abilities to secure victories that would be impossible for less gifted leaders. Others become independent military contractors, offering their services to the highest bidder or pursuing their own conquests. Some even establish their own territories or mercenary companies, building reputations that make potential enemies think twice before opposing them. Their presence on the battlefield is often enough to demoralize enemy forces, who recognize that they face not just a powerful warrior but a master tactician who has likely already planned their defeat in detail. Though they may lack the moral certainty of Champions or the brutal intimidation of Tyrants, the cold efficiency and tactical brilliance of Warlords make them perhaps the most consistently successful military leaders.
